reviews.review: 재밌는디 짧음

WARNING! Carry on reading! Or you will die, even if you only looked at the word warning! Once there was a little girl called Clarissa, she was ten-years-old and she lived in a mental hospital, because she killed her mom and her dad. She got so bad she went to kill all the staff in the hospital so the More- government decided that best idea was to get rid of her so they set up a special room to kill her, as humane as possible but it went wrong the machine they were using went wrong. And she sat there in agony for hours until she died. Now every week on the day of her death she returns to the person that reads this letter, on a monday night at 12:00a.m. She creeps into your room and kills you slowly, by cutting you and watching you bleed to death. Now send this to ten other profiles on this one site, and she will haunt someone else who doesn't. This isn't fake. apparently, if u copy and paste this to ten comments in the next ten minutes u will have the best of your life. TIC TOC.

One of my favourite game 10/10

This game is so good. You have a witty A.I watching over you, making even the most bland parts of puzzles interesting, an incredibly well thought out and enjoyable game mechanic. The story is fun, with many secrets and easter eggs. for a 10 year old game, it has definetly held up. 9/10

Крутая игра, в ней вы найдётя ясный сюжет, и много чего интуресного. Вы играете за девушку экперементатора она должна пройти все испытанния. В этой игре есть наблюдатель который дисматевирует вас. Теперь про графику, но графика там с минималок до ултра вроде и не изменилась. Тематика игры фентази, а похоже на фильм.
Мне игра понравилась я на 48 уровне, я специально оставлю вам коментарии пишите свои рекорды. Спасибо !

Portal é um jogo excelente! Se o que você procura é um desafio logico e que ao mesmo tempo teste suas habilidades motoras, esta no lugar certo!

Não tenho nenhum ponto negativo a citar desse belo jogo!
다들 한번씩 '포탈'이란 존재에 대해서 상상은 해보았지만 항상 상상에서 그쳤었는데, 이걸 또 벨브가, 상상을 실현해줬다.  진짜 잘만든 퍼즐 설계와 FPS적 요소들이 너무 잘 섞여서 진짜 인상깊은 게임. 이것도 죽기 전에 해야됨.
游戏流程4.4小时，通关后就吃灰了。基本没有卡关的地方，玩的过程很开心

이게임을 남이 하는거 뒤에서 보던제가 한번 해보니 플탐 1시간30분 정도 나오네요.
스토리도 좋고, 퍼즐도 너무 어렵지 않게 만들어나 컨트롤이 쉬워  재미있게 플레이했습니다.
여름 세일때 포탈1,2을 2,330에 구매한게 정말 다행이라고  생각하네요 ^^

花了将近5小时，终于磨磨蹭蹭地通关啦（撒花）！！对于我这样的智商真的不容易。。。这游戏出乎意料的有趣，简单的操作加上无敌的脑洞，居然让我乐此不疲地玩到了通关，一开始还觉得这是个解密游戏，结果玩到后面的场景却让我觉得毛骨悚然的，感觉像在玩逃生哈哈哈，GLaDOS作为唯一的boss简直不要太可爱了，絮絮叨叨的变着法子骂人，boss战的时候慌得一批，也不知道是她慌一点还是我慌一点，反正我是紧张得传送门都一直放歪，被自己蠢死！！结尾GLaDOS唱的歌真的又萌又好听，真的喜欢得不得了！！期待第二部GLaDOS的回归！
为什么我一打开就崩溃了

Bem, por onde posso começar ?
Portal é um jogo feito pela Valve no qual você deve resolver puzzles por meio de portais ( resumindo )
O jogo apresenta uma atmosfera linda, com graficos bons, personagens ( os 2 que o game tem ( GLaDOS e as Turrets ) ) cativantes e um humor muito bem feito. Puzzles legais e dificeis, mas que pela sua dificuldade deixa você querendo mais desafios. Uma pena o jogo ser curto ( tendo em cerca de 2 horas ) mas tirando isso vale muito a pena comprar. 
COMPRA












The cake is not a lie

Niesamowita wyżymaczka dla mózgu! Mimo iż poziomy na początku gry zdają się być łatwe to gdy brniemy w historię dalej robi się coraz trudniej i ciekawiej. Valve po prostu wiedziała co robi tworząc swoją gre! Gra, która daje niesamowitą ilość satysfakcji z modelu rozgrywki. Polecam każdemu kto uwielbia dobrą zabawę i genialną fabułę! Polecam także kontynuacje ;D.

Eines sehr schnelles, aber dafür unheimlich gutes Game. Abwechslungsreiche Aufgaben zum rätsel und ein Tick von Horror, also so habe ich es empfunden. Als ich das Spiel nach 3 Stunden durch hatte war ich ehrlich gesagt ziemlich traurig. Aber dafür gibt es ja einen 2ten Teil!

PRO: 

- Viele unterschiedliche Rätsel
- Läuft auf jeder Kartoffel (1080Ti auch :D)
- Bleibt auch nach langen versuchen spannend
- Keine Bugs

Contra: 

- Das Spiel ist verdammt schnell zu ende
- Es sollte kein Contra geben
Норм игра. Советую
Gute Rätsel aber leider noch ohne Modus, um zu zweit mit einem Freund Portal-Rätsel zu lösen. Diesen reicht dafür aber der Nachfolger nach.

FINALLY got to play this classic. 
Definitely glad I got to experience this after yeaaars of hearing about it. This came out when I was in middle school I believe, I am now a College senior and man what an enjoyable game left with wonder and a crave to get into this world some more. 
It's the simplicity that gives the icing on top.

Def recommend, I'd wait for a sale cause the value is ridiculous at that price. But if you have the cash for the full price, go for it.

Мне было так одиноко в этой игре, пока я не встретил милый куб. Эти сволочи заставили меня убить моего единственного друга. После этого, мне уже было безразлично что меня ждёт впереди. Да, я отомстил, но до конца игры ни разу не встречал кого-нибудь более разговорчивее и дружелюбнее чем милый куб. Жизнь не справедлива. Самые лучшие уходят рано.

4/5.
Швидше за все, ви грали в цю гру. А якщо чомусь ще не встигли, то купуйте зараз і грайте. Я не бачу жодної причини, чому Portal може комусь не сподобатись.
Buenísimo, puzzles bien diseñados, no tan complejo ni profundo ni largo como el 2 pero merece mucho la pena.
Perfect.

Her zamanki gibi gayet başarılı, zevkli ve güzel hikayerli bir Valve oyunu. Portal2 ye göre biraz kısa gelebilir ama doyurucu akılda kalan bir hikayesi var. Parasının hakkını veren herkesin denemesini tavsiye ettiğim bir oyun. Ha bu arada unutmayın, 
                                                                                  THE CAKE IS A LİE

buy this game. no, seriously. just buy it. it's just amazing. definitely a classic. one of the best steam games i've played. just buy the game.
Jogo sensacional, gostei muito da movimentação e dos puzzles, me fez pensar e esquentar a cuca hehe, recomendo a todos que gostam de pequenos desafios.

Do not touch the operational end of The Device.
Do not look directly at the operational end of The Device.
Do not submerge The Device in liquid, even partially.
Most importantly, under no circumstances should you [bzzzzzt].

Recuerdo haberlo jugado hace unos 2 o 3 años cuando no tenia Steam, ahora que tengo la oportunidad de comprarlo, lo compré.

Me sigue sorprendiendo la Historia, las mecanicas y los puzzles y eso que me lo he pasado mas de 10 veces, Un juegazo recomendado al 100%
2.6小时无攻略初通关，挑战未动。放假无聊 翻箱底翻出来的游戏，真的惊艳到我了，传送门+物理引擎的玩法几乎被完全开发，10年前的游戏设计放到今天也能让人感叹V社的牛B！！

Fun game and fantastic ending! The puzzles make you think without making you frustrated, and the game is the perfect length: long enough to be a full experience and short enough that it doesn't get repetitive. Also, the perfect amounts of humor and creepiness to complement the puzzles.

An Absolute must try the game is really short (Unless you count the challenges), but in overall a fun experience, I bought this game on sale for a cheap price, but don't hesitate to buy it on full price, the game is really unique and the concept is awesome!

Overall I give this game a 10/10!!!
Great Game.
good
Simple but clever idea to form a fiendish puzzler. Old title, but well executed & emminently playable.
虽然没有变异生物没有鬼怪，但惊悚的氛围渲染真的很好，解密也很赞！好评！！
还不错，高级地图挺好玩的

夏日特惠花7元和Portal2一起买的，实在是物超所值，大赞V社！
这游戏超出我的意料，无论是画质、剧情、可玩性……都令我意想不到。强烈安利！
结局也是耐人寻味的，这里就不剧透了。通关不难也不容易，我大概花了4小时吧，听着幕后大boss唱的歌曲，仿佛自己完成了什么伟大的任务似的，感到十分喜悦放松，本质上这是一部大作！
游戏人物话语不乏幽默，玩法单一、剧情简单却十分趣味耐看，代入感强烈，使我反复回味久久不能自己。
它的确把我震撼到了，不愧是IGN所评的第三伟大的游戏。
不说了，我要去玩续集Portal2了。

Es muy bueno, no puede parar de jugar hasta que me lo pase todo.
Yo lo recomiendo mucho.

Pour tout vous dire, Portal est un jeu qu'on doit avoir déjà joué dans une vie. Développé par Valve, ce jeu entremêle la stratégie et l'action sur plusieurs niveaux plus difficiles au fil du temps. Le jeu a une petite durée de vie pouvant atteindre minimum 2 heures. Malgré la petite durée de vie, il existe des mini jeux après la fin du jeu comme les courses contre-la-montre ou des niveaux expert !

Votre but principal est de découvrir ce qu'il s'est passé, c'est donc par le biais de cette histoire que vous devez passer des salles en trouvant la porte de sortie grâce à un fusil qui sera probablement votre meilleur ami pendant votre aventure ! Le jeu n'est pas de tout repos et vous demandera de la concentration. Il vous est possible de repasser le jeu si vous n'avez pas tous les succès Steam ou que vous êtes un speedrunner de renom !

Je recommande de jeu !
If you haven’t played this yet what are you doing. This is a classic and come on, who doesn’t love portals, cake, and a sadistic robot constantly talking down to you?
